allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: initial project setup for LinkedSel

- Next.js 15 with App Router and React 19
- TailwindCSS v4 for styling with Radix UI components
- Supabase for auth, database, and storage
- Zustand for state management
- Fabric.js for canvas-based carousel editor
- LemonSqueezy integration for payments
- PostHog for analytics
- c15t for cookie consent
- CI/CD pipeline with GitHub Actions
- Full TypeScript support with strict mode

Includes landing pages \(home, features, pricing, legal\) and
app pages \(dashboard, editor, templates, brand-kits, settings\).
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: complete MVP features and fix routing

- Add LemonSqueezy webhook handler for subscription management
- Add AI content generation with OpenAI/Anthropic support \(BYOK\)
- Add watermark logic for free users on PDF export
- Add templates system with default templates
- Add brand kits page \(premium feature\)
- Add settings page with subscription and API keys management
- Fix all /app/ route paths \(route groups don''t appear in URLs\)
- Update middleware to protect correct routes
- Update database types for Supabase v2.47+
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
fix: editor image upload, undo/redo, and formatting tools

- Add image upload via file input with FileReader
- Fix undo/redo with proper history management and canvas reload
- Add background color picker
- Add fill color picker for selected objects
- Add font size controls \(+/-\) for text objects
- Add bold/italic toggles for text objects
- Add selectedObject state tracking with canvas event handlers
- Add saveHistory\(\) calls before all mutations
- Fix disabled state for undo/redo buttons
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: comprehensive editor improvements

- Add project save/load functionality with API routes
- Add context menu \(right-click\) with z-order controls
- Add format presets \(LinkedIn, Instagram, Twitter, Facebook\)
- Add keyboard shortcuts \(Ctrl+Z/Y, Delete, arrows, Ctrl+S\)
- Add live slide preview thumbnails in sidebar
- Add project name editing in toolbar
- Add duplicate/delete slide buttons on hover
- Dashboard now lists saved projects with thumbnails
EOF
\)")
